summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackThe I'm From Mugwort Essence features a refreshing, fast-absorbing formula that deeply hydrates, soothes, and replenishes moisture from within. Infused with pure mugwort extract, it calms irritation and revitalizes the skin for a healthy, radiant glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsPrevents premature aging by combating damage from environmental aggressorsStimulates collagen production, which plumps up skin and helps reduce the appearance of fine linesKey IngredientsMugwort Extract - contains antimicrobial properties that can help fight off bacteria and fungi that cause skin infections, such as acne and eczemaItem 2642150How To UseAfter cleansing, prep the skin with the toner. Dispense an appropriate amount of the essence and gently pat over the face for better absorption, especially concentrating on the most sensitive areas.IngredientsArtemisia Princeps Extract.
how_to_use: After cleansing, prep the skin with the toner. Dispense an appropriate amount of the essence and gently pat over the face for better absorption, especially concentrating on the most sensitive areas.

reviews.headline: Iffy on product
reviews.comments: overall seems very gentle hydrating and calminf, but for me it did not calm my skin. It aggrivated and made my skin flare up with tons of texture that i did not have before applying. Just be careful.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL FOR SENSITIVE SKIN üôå
reviews.comments: I've lost count of how many bottles of this I've gone through but it is a staple in my routine. It's hydrating, calming, soothing, and reduces redness. An excellent choice for people with se sitive or reactive skin and great for those who shave their face due to its soothing properties. With a light, almost slippery and non-sticky texture that makes it easy to layer, this is a non-negotiable in my routine.

reviews.headline: One of my all time favorites
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing for sensitive skin. It really does make a difference with redness. No fragrance or essential oils, no smell whatsoever. It' has a watery texture with a little bit of slip. I highly recommend sensitive or acne prone skins try it

reviews.headline: Careful
reviews.comments: This stuff will break you out if are acne prone. I got some type of cluster break out on my chin. As soon as i stopped using it it went away. Dont let the TikTok hype fool you.

reviews.headline: MY SKIN LOVES IT!!!
reviews.comments: I have tried several and so far this one hasn't disappointed my skin.

faceoff_positive.comments: @imfrom_global Mugwort essence ‚ú®Ô∏èWhat it is? Its a soothing skincare product that repairs and provides an immediate feeling of comfort to the skin. ‚ú®Ô∏èStar ingredients Mugwort extract, also known as Artemisia princeps, is well known for treating and preventing acne by reducing skin inflammation and redness. We want an all-natural, clean beauty product, thus this one is created exclusively of 100% pure mugwort extract, which lowers the likelihood of reactions from other substances in the formulation ‚ú®Ô∏èHow to use? Pour the essence into the palm of your hand and apply it directly onto your skin by patting it until fully absorbed. ‚ú®Ô∏èMy experience To see if the I'm from mugwort essence lives up to the hype, I've been including it into my skincare routine for more than a week. If you've never used an essence in your routine, it is a cross between a toner and a serum that aids in moisturizing skin preparation and delivering the effects of concentrated essential components, in this case, mugwort extract. I enjoy how the Mugwort essence absorbs entirely into my skin without leaving a greasy behind. Those with oily and combination skin would prefer this more because, despite its consistency, it won't leave your skin greasy and, most likely, you'll feel that it provides adequate moisture for you. It has a strong herbal scent that is strongly reminiscent of "oriental medicine. " I use my hand to apply it. It's truly incredibly relaxing, and I've also used it numerous times as a "mask" (I soak cotton pads and keep them on my skin for a little while). All skin types would benefit from using this as a hydrating essence because of the additional relaxing properties of mugwort. You can always count on it to be your go-to product when your skin is acting up and needs to be reset. I advise anyone with sensitive skin to try this essence.
faceoff_positive.headline: I enjoy how the Mugwort essence absorbs entirely into my ski
